cast.name: 迈克尔·马德森 Michael Madsen
迈克尔·艾伦·米利甘 Michael Aaron Milligan
莱姆希·克鲁尔 Ramsey Krull
凯蒂·勒克莱齐 Katie Leclerc
亚历克西斯·克纳普 Alexis Knapp

writer.name: Brendan Gabriel Murphy Brendan Gabriel Murphy

director.name: Brendan Gabriel Murphy Brendan Gabriel Murphy

introduction: The story follows Johnny Philobosian (Beard), a former Army Ranger who after the Afghanistan War joins a motorcycle gang, causing him to spiral into a life of crime and addiction. Finally breaking away from the grips of the brutal gang, he turns on his crew, bringing down the entire organization.With the leader Ramsey (Krull) heading to prison, Johnny enters witness protection, changing his identity to Casey Hatfield and relocating to Utah. After several years of hiding, while trying to rekindle a relationship with his daughter and ex-wife Francis (Leclerc), his whereabouts are discovered. A psychotic contract killer, known only as “The Chameleon” (Milligan) because his penchant for disguises, is hired to hunt Casey and his family down. Desperate for help, Casey heads to Texas to track down his estranged father Reed Philobosian (Madsen), a former gritty motorcycle gang leader who has no love for his son. They will have to come together and make amends but that’s if they don’t end up killing one another first.’s if they don’t end up killing one another first.
